page.title: 10Games children play
page.content: In addition to such traditional games as{Rugby,Football,Hockey(all usually {played during the winter),Cricket, {Tennis and Athletics(all usually {played in the summer),a}number of less usual activities may be viewed during childrens playtime. {British Bulldogs}is one such game.This game is{generally played on a field or {between two buildings}.One person is then chosen to be{"it"}.This person takes up a position directly between the two areas of safety:opposite ends of the field or either one of the two buildings.The{objective for those {standing in the "safe areas"is to run {past the "it"}to the opposite end of the field{without}being caught and dragged to the ground.If they are caught then they too become "it".This continues until everyone has been caught.
